```{r}
library(shiny)

# Define UI for application
ui <- fluidPage(
   titlePanel("Hello Shiny!"),
   
   sidebarLayout(
      sidebarPanel(
         sliderInput("obs", 
                     "Number of observations:", 
                     min = 0, 
                     max = 1000, 
                     value = 500)
      ),
      
      mainPanel(
         plotOutput("distPlot")
      )
   )
)

# Define server logic
server <- function(input, output) {
   output$distPlot <- renderPlot({
      hist(rnorm(input$obs))
   })
}

# Run the application 
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
